mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.newbie_gear_bag: Creates a pack of level one gear.
mmorpg.lore.newbie_gear_bag1: Three Furnaces below, five iron wills above,
mmorpg.lore.newbie_gear_bag2: seed in the middle, materialize hope!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This Gem can be inserted into a Socket slot
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus dmg at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Put in Map Device to Use
mmorpg.word.bewarecreativebagbug2: while on server could clear the bag!
mmorpg.word.craftingdeletesitemsinside: Crafting deletes items inside, empty beforehand!
mmorpg.word.holdtopreventpickup: Hold in your hand to prevent item pickup.
mmorpg.word.item_modifiable_in_station: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.word.mapworldsareresetongamereloa: Map Worlds Are Reset On Game Reload
mmorpg.word.needsgearwithrunesinserted: Needs Gear with these runes inserted
mmorpg.word.noduplicaterunes: No duplicate runes of same type
mmorpg.word.runelvlnothigherthanitemlvl: Rune lvl not higher than item lvl
mmorpg.advancement.desc.addaffix: Unique items have lower chance to gain affixes, that's why these currencies are so important
mmorpg.advancement.desc.adventuremap: Maps are used in Map Devices. Sacrificing one gives you time to spend in other dimensions to attain loot!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.autosalvagebag: These bags when equipped will automatically salvage items! This means all those bad common, uncommon and other useless items can be automatically salvaged! Higher rarity bag gives more bonus item chance.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.chaosorb: Gives Chaos Stats. These Stats can be good or bad. Chaos stats can't be removed, so choose wisely which item you modify.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.currencybag: Currency Bag automatically picks up Mine and Slash ores, currencies etc
mmorpg.advancement.desc.factorystation: Turns bad gears into items of higher rarity.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.levelpenalty: When you kill a mob that is too high or too low level, the item and exp drops will be reduced. Try to kill mobs within 5 levels of yours.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.levelup: Every level milestone allows items to spawn with new and better affixes, sets and so on. Loot new gear to find out and power up!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.levelup10: Starting at lvl 10, mobs will start dropping currencies and adventure maps (per default config).
mmorpg.advancement.desc.lootbag: Loot Bag automatically picks up gears, spells, runes etc
mmorpg.advancement.desc.mapbag: Map Bag automatically picks up adventure maps
mmorpg.advancement.desc.mapdevice: This device allows you to sacrifice an adventure map and a seed, to gain time that allows you to enter adventure maps, gain special rewards like unique items and currencies, progress through tiers for better rewards!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.masterbag: Master Bag automatically picks up almost all Mine and Slash loot drops and each is separated into a different container for easy sorting.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.modifystation: Modify Station is used to modify gears with currencies. Currencies have special effects like adding a prefix, rerolling a suffix etc. This station can also insert runes, awaken runewords etc.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.orboftransmutati: Completely re-creates an item, giving it a chance to attain a higher rarity. One of the most common currency items.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.repairstation: Repair Station is used to repair your gear. Put ores (common, uncommon etc) into the fuel slot and then put items to repair left. They can also have a capacitor that decreases the repair cost
mmorpg.advancement.desc.salvagestation: Turns items into ores and sometimes currencies.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.stoneofhope: Recreates the item completely, giving you a higher rarity. Very useful if you have a legendary item with bad/unwanted stats.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.welcomemineandsl: This mod is all about killing mobs, looting epic gear to kill more mobs!
mmorpg.chat.a_piece_of_gear_is_too_high_: You Don't meet requirements of a piece of current gear.
mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over maximum level
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Mine and Slash [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.has_died_by_the_hands_of: has died by the hands of
mmorpg.chat.nospaceforportal: No Space for the portals. Please make 13x13 wide room.
mmorpg.chat.player_died_in_a_map_world: Player died in a map world
mmorpg.chat.this_is_not_an_attunement_al: This is not an Attunement Altar
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath
mmorpg.chat.you_are_not_inside_a_map_wor: You are not inside a map world
mmorpg.chat.you_have_attuned_to_this_alt: You have attuned to this Altar
mmorpg.chat.you_have_ran_out_of_time: You have ran out of time
mmorpg.chat.youneedheartstone: You need a hearthstone item to attune to this block.
item.mmorpg.uniques.axe.axewaterfire0.de: My efforts to merge elements shall not be in vain.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletfir: Harness Fire, wield it as your weapon. Incinerate them.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletnat: Fools fight for treasure, but I keep on living.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletset: No matter the depths, it will be mine!
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletthu: Heavenly Lightning? I call it mana.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletwat: Burn them all! With Ice of course.
item.mmorpg.uniques.charm.charmnature0.d: My life may be limited, but I shine throughout it.
Jade is only worth after it is polished.
item.mmorpg.uniques.chest.chestfire0.des: What can't kill me only makes me glow brighter.
item.mmorpg.uniques.chest.chestmana0.des: The process of multiplying energy has just begun!
Those who dared to follow had long since died.
item.mmorpg.uniques.chest.chestwater0.de: I am a Fortress of pure Ice.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.fire_ele_hamm: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.hammerphysica: Not even mountains can bar my path!
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.hammerthunder: I will be safe when my enemies are dead.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.nature_ele_ha: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.thunder_ele_h: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.water_ele_ham: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.helmet.helmetfire0.d: I see flames all around me.
item.mmorpg.uniques.helmet.helmetthunder: I see sparks all around me.
What mortals can't see belongs to me.
item.mmorpg.uniques.helmet.helmetwisdom0: True wisdom is knowing you know nothing.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklaceene: One becomes two, two becomes four!
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklacefir: I will take down my enemies with me, in flames.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklacenat: I seek strength only in nature.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklaceset: I seek what is buried underneath.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklacewat: Crystal clear and yet so incredibly tough.
item.mmorpg.uniques.pants.pantswater0.de: Try to move me, I dare you.
I summon Flame in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.nature_ele_ring: I summon Venom in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.ringenergy0.des: I will pay any price to continue!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.thunder_ele_rin: I summon Lightning in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.water_ele_ring0: I summon Frost in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.fire_ele_staff: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.nature_ele_sta: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.thunder_ele_st: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.uniquestafflif: All blood will be mine, eventually.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.uniquestaffthu: Controlled power can bring both energy and destruction.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.uniquestaffwat: What is frozen is as good as dead.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.water_ele_staf: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.sword.swordwater0.de: Energy is everywhere, it just begs to be grasped
item.mmorpg.attack_infusion.desc: Infuses an item with Attack Modifiers
item.mmorpg.currency.add_group_map.desc: Turns a Map into a group map.
item.mmorpg.currency.add_set.desc: Adds a set to an item
item.mmorpg.currency.clear_runes.desc: Clears runes and runewords from an item.
item.mmorpg.currency.number_reroll.desc: Re-rolls all numbers on a gear
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity
item.mmorpg.currency.whisp_of_chaos.desc: Adds a Major Arcana Chaos Stat
item.mmorpg.defense_infusion.desc: Infuses an item with Defense Modifiers
item.mmorpg.resource_infusion.desc: Infuses an item with Resource Modifiers
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_attributes: Adds to all core stats like VIT, DEX, STR, INT, WIS, STA
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_ele_dmg: Increases All DMG of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.alleledmg: Increases All Elemental DMG, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_mastery_trait: Your phys basic attacks inflict % of your phys dmg as bleed on targets
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_reflect: When blocking an attack, damage the enemy
mmorpg.stat_desc.blockstrength: Blocks part of DMG when blocking, if all damage is blocked, attack is canceled
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood_mage_trait: Your have no mana, you use blood instead. Max blood is half of your health. You replenish blood with any non spell related health restoration method like hp regen or lifesteal.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bonus_specific_spell: Increases Effect of that spell, whether that's damage, heal etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.buff_energy_regen: Killing Blows with Bomb Spells grant you Energy Regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.buff_mana_regen: Killing Blows with Bomb Spells grant you Mana Regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit: Chance to multiply damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity: Increases Crit Hit, Dodge and Armor
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_atk_dmg: Adds x element damage on weapon hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_resist: Stops a % damage of that element
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_damage: Spell damage is used by spells and some other stats
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_to_attack_dmg: Adds a % of your spell DMG as DMG to your every weapon hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_wep_damage: Increases elemental damage of x weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_affinity: Increases Resist and Spell Damage of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_conversion: Conversion adds a % of one to the other
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_focus: Increases Dmg for that element by a % but decreases dmg from all other elements.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_transfer: Transfer takes a % from 1 and gives to the other
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy: Energy is used to do basic attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.energytomanaconversion: Adds to 1 based on the others' amount
mmorpg.stat_desc.ghost_projectile: Your Single Target Spell Projectiles now go through enemies.
mmorpg.stat_desc.harmony_trait: Half of your hp restoration effects go to your magic shield instead. This for example means your heal spells only heal half of the value to health and other half to magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health: Allows you to take more damage from mobs
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.highcritaddarmor: If Critical Hit is More than 30 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.highcritaddlifesteal: If Critical Hit is More than 30 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.highdodgeaddcritdamage: If Dodge Rating is More than 25 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.highdodgeaddphysdamage: If Dodge Rating is More than 25 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.homing: Your Single Target Spell Projectiles now Home in on the target.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_healing: Increases all types of healing recieved like health regen, lifesteal, life on hit, spell heals etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Increase Magic Shield %, Mana Regen and Mana and All Elemental damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.life_on_hit: Gives health on basic attack hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.lifesteal: % of basic attack DMG added to health
mmorpg.stat_desc.loot_drop_bonus: Increases Loot Drops of the type
mmorpg.stat_desc.lowcrithitadddodgeflat: If Critical Hit is Less than 10 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.lowcrithitaddhealthmult: If Critical Hit is Less than 10 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.lowdodgeaddarmor: If Dodge Rating is Less than 5 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.lowdodgeaddcrithit: If Dodge Rating is Less than 5 Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: Works like extra health. But regen is separate.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.magical_life_trait: Transforms your magic shield into health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_battery_trait: While mana is above 25% absorb half of damage by spending mana. Dodge rating halved.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.manatoenergyconversion: Adds to 1 based on the others' amount
mmorpg.stat_desc.physical_damage: How much DMG your basic attacks do
mmorpg.stat_desc.physical_dispersion: If you are doing elemental dmg, transfers physical damage to elemental damage of highest amount.
mmorpg.stat_desc.purity: Your Self Heal Spells now cure you of a negative effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.reckless_blows_trait: All your penetrations are doubled, but your armor is halved.
mmorpg.stat_desc.refreshing_breeze_trait: Dodging restores 50% of your energy regen
mmorpg.stat_desc.shining_light: Your Self Heal Spells now grant you Aoe Regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases DMG of all spells no matter the element
mmorpg.stat_desc.stamina: Increases Energy, Energy Regen, Armor and Armor Percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.steady_hand_trait: Your crit chance and crit dmg is 0. All your attacks deal 25% more damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength: Increases Physical DMG, Critical DMG, Physical DMG multi
mmorpg.stat_desc.true_hit_trait: + 50% Crit Dmg Multi but non crit dmg is halved.
mmorpg.stat_desc.vitality: Increases Health, Health percent and Health Regen
mmorpg.stat_desc.weapon_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.wisdom: Increases Both Mana, Magic Shield Regens and elemental resists
mmorpg.stat_desc.zephyr's_speed: Your Self Heal Spells now boost your speed temporarily.
lore_0_item.attack_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
lore_0_item.currency.add_secondary_stat: More power is always good, right?
lore_0_item.currency.chaos_orb: Do not gamble what you are not willing to lose.
lore_0_item.currency.clear_runes: If only we could re-write the past.
lore_0_item.currency.item_levelup: Who said your sword can't level with you?
lore_0_item.currency.number_reroll: Hopefully works better than the last time.
lore_0_item.currency.randomize_prefix: There is always a better choice
lore_0_item.currency.randomize_suffix: There is always a better choice
lore_0_item.currency.stone_of_hope: When there is hope, there is a way.
lore_0_item.defense_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
lore_0_item.normal_upgrade_infusion: You start to feel the essence of Luck.
lore_0_item.resource_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
lore_0_item.wondrous_upgrade_infusion: Grasp Luck with your own hands.
lore_0_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: Place An Item Of Maximum Rarity You want to
lore_2_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: Then right click with this bag.
lore_3_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: To Not Salvage Any Items, clear the config by
lore_4_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: Right Clicking the bag while shield slot is empty.
lore_0_item.mmorpg.ores: Precious Ingredient that can be used in many ways:
